commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Stakeholder expert group to support the application of the Package Travel and Linked Travel Arrangements Directive (2015/2302)#E03617#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3617#Member#C#EU VAT Forum#E02845#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2845#Not a member#C#Subgroup on administrative cooperation between Member States and Businesses in the field of VAT fraud, cooperative compliance and e-Commerce
goals__remit: The European Holiday Home Association is a united voice of short term rentals in Europe. Its members are companies engaged in the marketing and distribution of holiday homes through both on-line and off-line methods, member state holiday home trade associations and others.
